_sText:
The first version of this prefab was created by Fibbs, the second by vince. and the third by me.


Story:

I was really inspirated by the visual timer by Fibbs and the improved timer by vince., so I decided to make an advanced version of Fibbs´s and vince.´s timer.
The timer works like vince.´s improved timer, but I added some features:

(Features:)

-Another control panel to set the time limit of the timer (with an output (test_output1))
-Another screen with the information about its state (active or inactive)
-An alert light with alarm (for more effects :D)
-A test output (a door, which is closing when the timer finishes)

You can choose the time limit of the timer!

Introductions to use the timer correctly:

-Press both reset buttons (first the big one near the start and stop button, then the little one near the set button)
-Choose your time limit with the "+" and the "-" buttons (with "+" you can add 60 seconds, with "-" you can remove 60 seconds)
-Press set to set the time limit (this will unlock the big start button)
-Press "Start" to start the timer or "Stop" to stop the timer
(-Press both reset buttons again to get a new time limit)

Enjoy :D!

If you want to use this prefab:

Please credit Fibbs, vince. and me if you use this timer in your map or edit this!

Special thanks to:

-Fibbs -for his great first version and the original idea! :D-
-vince. -for his good improved timer!-

(Some more information...

I had to use six math_counter to get the limit chooser working, I tried this with three but that didn´t work anyhow.)

!Important!

If you got trouble with the alertlight object I created I can upload another version with a CSS prop light instead of a point_spotlight!

Please give some feedback!
